 Actually, the concept of habeus corpus goes back much further than you believe, it was just named "habeus corpus" about 1000 years ago. the concept itself, if not the name, goes back to the ME, and predates christianity by a long shot. There has been a concept of a "right" to habeus corpus as long as there has been a concept of detainment as a punishment.
